_changelog: 2025-12-21: Major update - Added new PDFs and alphabetical sorting
- DE: Reorganized technical rules: ASR, TRBS, TRGS alphabetically
- AT: Added AUVA M.plus 040 Evaluierung series (E1, E2, E4, E7, E8)
- AT: Added AUVA M 100, M 203, M 843, M 844, M.plus 302
- AT: Reorganized all Merkblätter alphabetically within categories
- NL: Reorganized all documents alphabetically within categories
2025-12-20: Fixed 16 broken URLs based on pipeline_errors.json analysis
